name: epoch-converter
title: Epoch Converter
description: Get current epoch timestamps and convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable datetime strings.
author: vitalibo

commands.name: epochseconds
commands.title: Get epoch seconds
commands.description: Copy current Unix timestamp in seconds to clipboard

commands.name: epochmillis
commands.title: Get epoch milliseconds
commands.description: Copy current Unix timestamp in milliseconds to clipboard

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
